title: Anon8801
author: Anon8801
content: Hey guys,My host is Steve on stake.com.He has been continuously insulting me and accusing me of things and now he is completely ignoring me (3 days now) and also refuses to transfer my account to a new host.I have conversations from him that are beyond despicable.I would like to get my rewards and move to another site. Any advice?I spoke to other hosts and they have agreed to take me on but cannot do so without him transferring me.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: I see you already made a post on this topic. It's better to wait to get a response from them. But if not then you can consider PMing Stuna who is looking after their bitcointalk presence.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: You state that he has been accusing you of things.  Can you share these accusations with us?  It seems like you're playing the victim without giving the information about WHY your host Steve is behaving this way.  Is it a simple misunderstanding on his part?  Are you doing something shady that he says is breaking the rules?  Why not just close your account and start a new one selecting a different host?  I feel like there's more to this story and if you provide specifics along with screenshots to prove you are speaking the truth, you may find more success in getting the help you need.  Good luck!

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Since you already made a post on stakes announcement thread, I se no need making another one here, you should have waited for them to respond to your query there, but anyways, I will advice you share some proof of the this allegation, maybe you can share the screenshot of the chat you had with Steve or something, with proof, I don't think anybody will take you seriously.One thing I can assure you of is that Stake is a very reputable casino, they treat their customers fairly, and as long as you did not break or go against any of their terms and conditions/service, your issue will be looked into and resolved in a way that is fair for both you and stake.

comments.body: Here’s the “proof”I had an issue with a bet where stakes odds provider scam radar messed up a bet for 4.3k. He refused to help me and called me a scammer. After making my case heard here, darko reached out to me the next day and resolved the issue. However, he didn’t pay me on the single, he just credited me back for the wager amount which was already bullshit to begin with.Proof here https://ibb.co/56NRyrMhttps://ibb.co/NrwtDm3Darko credited me back the 4.3k as a bonus. As he did this, it messed up my + - and 25% cashback rewards.The next day, I lost 4.3k + 5k of my own money and should have had roughly 2k in new cashback, Steve said I had nothing and told me to basically stop trying to scam him.I reached out to darko directly and he advised that he would contact Steve on my behalf. Proof herehttps://ibb.co/r3djm50https://ibb.co/mcqTjLpI then approached Steve and instead of fixing the issue, he blocked me on TG and than threatened to only answer me once a week via email. I am down over two million dollars on this site and this guy treats me like I’m some child.To put the cherry on top, Steve had told me(You’re about even) than I lost 2k and he told me“Nah you don’t have any rewards now” lolNow he’s ignoring me completely, refuses to send my cashback and refuses to transfer me to a new host.I have always had issues with Steve for two years now, he’s a screen warrior. I love stake but I’m no longer interested in dealing with Steve at all. I am also a diamond 3 player.
